author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Last chance to apply for media acceditationTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Last chance to apply for media acceditation
Members of the media are reminded to apply for media accreditation to attend the 9th annual Hospitality Investment Conference Africa – HICA 2015. Online applications which reach us by the end of today, 17:30, will still be accepted and processed.
HICA is a leading hospitality investment conference in sub Saharan Africa. The event assembles the region’s senior hospitality professionals, international hoteliers, investors, developers and top public sector leaders from across the region. This conference is about decision makers rubbing shoulders, generating new business, doing deals and creating opportunity.
Source:-HICA
